comment.author: 60406173@N04
comment._content: The upper photograph on this page is not Monkey Bay, nor Cape Maclear, nor Nkhata Bay. It can only be Langenburg (formerly Parumbira), German East Africa, now Tanzania, at the northeast corner of Lake Malawi.  This was the headquarters of the German administration on the lake and where the German ship "Hermann von Wissmann" was based.  When the administrative centre was moved to Neu Langenburg, now Tukuyu, this became Alt Langenburg.
